content: Yes, I am aware of Cafe24. Cafe24 is a South Korean e-commerce platform provider that offers a range of services including website building, online store management, payment processing, and marketing solutions. The company was founded in 1999 and has since grown to become one of the leading e-commerce platform providers in South Korea. Cafe24 serves over 1.7 million merchants and has expanded its services to other countries including Japan, Vietnam, and Indonesia.
